edge: The soundtrack for Taare Zameen Par was released under the label T-Series on November 7, 2007.
The music for the Taare Zameen Par soundtrack is mainly composed by Shankar–Ehsaan–Loy.
The lyrics for the songs in the Taare Zameen Par soundtrack are written by Prasoon Joshi.
"Mera Jahan" was scored by Shailendra Barve for the Taare Zameen Par soundtrack.
The lyrics for "Mera Jahan" in the Taare Zameen Par soundtrack were written by Gupte.
Shankar Mahadevan won the National Film Award for Best Male Playback Singer for "Maa" in the Taare Zameen Par soundtrack.
The lyrics for "Maa" in the Taare Zameen Par soundtrack were written by Prasoon Joshi, who also won the National Film Award for Best Lyrics for this song.
